title: Human Illness from Exposure to Bacteria

content.description: The graph below depicts the dose response curves for three common bacteria and a newly discovered bacterium found in streams near certain agricultural properties.
content.question: An individual is exposed to the water in the stream from which the sample show in the graph was taken. If the individual was exposed to the highest dose of the bacteria, which of the following bacteria would have the lowest probability of causing illness if ingested?

choices.label: Salmonella <math alttext="s p p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: Skill 5.E: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about environmental issues.
